EmailTemplate.name: DPS - DuPont™ Consumer Products iwth KEVLAR®
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ CONSUMER PRODUCTS WITH KEVLAR®
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in DuPont™ Kevlar® products.
Recently through an email you expressed an interest in our new DuPont™ Kevlar® products. DuPont™ Kevlar® helps make consumer products better and stronger. For more information on a few of these products, please visit our DuPont website.
http://www.dupont.com/products-and-services/fabrics-fibers-nonwovens/fibers/uses-and-applications/kevlar-consumer-products.html
________________________________________________
DuPont™ Protection Solutions
